auth.termsAgreement: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your home inventory
dashboard.noItemsAdded: No items added in the last 30 days

items.title: Items
items.getStartedAddItem: Get started by adding your first item
items.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

categories.title: Categories
categories.subtitle: Organize your items into hierarchical categories
categories.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? Items in this category will become uncategorized, and child categories will become root-level.
categories.createToOrganize: Create categories to organize your items
categories.selectCategoryToView: Select a category to view its items

locations.title: Locations
locations.subtitle: Define where your items are stored
locations.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? Items in this location will have no location assigned, and child locations will become root-level.
locations.createToOrganize: Create locations to organize where your items are stored
locations.selectLocationToView: Select a location to view its items
locations.uploadImageDescription: Upload a photo of a storage space to have AI suggest locations
locations.useAiToAnalyze: Use AI to analyze an image
locations.uploadPhotoToSuggest: Upload a photo of a storage space to suggest locations
locations.reviewAndEdit: Review and edit the suggested locations
locations.noCompartmentsFound: No compartments identified. Click "Add" to add one manually.
locations.notFoundDescription: This location may have been deleted or you don't have access.

images.title: Images
images.classifiedImagesSubtitle: {count} images have been classified by AI
images.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP
images.uploadAndClassify: Upload and classify images to see them here
images.noSearchResultsDescription: No images match your search. Try a different term.

customPrompt.title: Custom AI Instructions
customPrompt.description: Provide additional context to help the AI better identify your item. For example, specify naming conventions like 'bin X,Y' or provide specific details about the item.
customPrompt.placeholder: e.g., 'This is a bin from a storage rack. Label bins using the format Row-Column (e.g., A1, B3)'

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.subtitle: Get personalized suggestions based on your inventory
aiAssistant.emptyStateTitle: How can I help you today?
aiAssistant.emptyStateDescription: Ask me anything about your inventory. I can help with planting schedules, craft project ideas, organization tips, and more.
aiAssistant.placeholder: Ask me anything about your inventory...

examples.plantingSchedule: Create a planting schedule for my seeds
examples.craftProjects: Suggest craft projects using my supplies
examples.organizationTips: How can I organize my inventory better?
examples.shoppingList: What items am I running low on?

billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your AI credits and billing
billing.insufficientCreditsMessage: You don't have enough credits to perform this action.
billing.creditsExplanation: Credits power HomERP's AI features. Each AI classification uses 1 credit to analyze your image and identify the item.
billing.freeCreditsDescription: Every account receives 5 free credits each month, automatically replenished on your signup anniversary.
billing.purchasedCreditsDescription: Buy additional credits anytime. Purchased credits never expire and are used only after your free monthly credits run out.
billing.creditCostDescription: AI image classification: 1 credit per image. Your free credits are used first, then purchased credits.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
settings.currencyDescription: Display prices in your preferred currency
settings.themeDescription: Choose light, dark, or system theme
settings.aiSystemProfileDescription: Configure your profile for personalized AI recommendations
settings.collaborationDescription: Share your inventory with family or team members

systemProfile.title: System Profile
systemProfile.subtitle: Help AI understand your needs for better recommendations
systemProfile.hobbyTypesDescription: Select the types of hobbies you're interested in
systemProfile.interestCategoriesDescription: Select categories you care about most
systemProfile.retentionMonthsDescription: Consider items for purge after this many months of non-use
systemProfile.quantityThresholdDescription: Consider items with quantity above this for purge suggestions
systemProfile.minValueKeepDescription: Keep items worth more than this regardless of usage
systemProfile.profileDescriptionDescription: Describe yourself to help AI understand your needs
systemProfile.profileDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm an electronics hobbyist who builds custom keyboards and repairs vintage audio equipment...
systemProfile.purgeAggressivenessDescription: How aggressively should AI suggest purging items?
systemProfile.aggressivenessConservativeDescription: Only suggest items that are clearly unused
systemProfile.configureProfile: Configure your profile to get personalized AI recommendations

declutterSuggestions.title: Declutter Suggestions
declutterSuggestions.subtitle: AI-powered suggestions to help organize your inventory
declutterSuggestions.generateDescription: Use AI to analyze your inventory and suggest items you might want to declutter
declutterSuggestions.costExplanation: Cost is calculated at 1 credit per {itemsPerCredit} items
declutterSuggestions.configureProfileFirst: Configure your system profile before generating suggestions
declutterSuggestions.insufficientCreditsDescription: You don't have enough credits to generate suggestions
declutterSuggestions.needMoreCredits: You need {needed} credits but only have {have}
declutterSuggestions.addFirstItem: Add your first item to get started
declutterSuggestions.generateCompleteDescription: Found {count} items to review, used {credits} credits
declutterSuggestions.generateError: Failed to generate suggestions. Please try again.
declutterSuggestions.noRecommendationsDescription: Generate suggestions to see items you might want to declutter

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.dashboardSubtitle: Manage users, billing, and system settings
admin.manageUsersDescription: View and manage user accounts, adjust credits, and control admin access
admin.managePacksDescription: Configure available credit packs and pricing
admin.manageFeedbackDescription: Review and respond to user feedback and bug reports
admin.manageWebhooksDescription: Configure webhook integrations for system events

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage API keys for external integrations and automation
apiKeys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? Any systems using this key will lose access immediately.
apiKeys.name: Name
apiKeys.scopesHelp: Select which permissions this API key should have
apiKeys.noApiKeysDescription: Create an API key to enable external integrations
apiKeys.keyCreatedWarning: This is the only time you will see this key. Copy it now and store it securely.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: Configure webhook integrations for system events
webhooks.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this webhook? This will also delete all execution logs.
webhooks.headersHelp: Add custom headers as key-value pairs
webhooks.bodyTemplateHelp: Use {{variable}} syntax for template variables. Leave empty for default JSON payload.
webhooks.retryCountHelp: Number of retry attempts for failed webhooks (0-10)
webhooks.noWebhooksDescription: Create your first webhook to receive notifications when events occur
webhooks.noExecutionsDescription: Webhook execution logs will appear here

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.subtitle: Help us improve HomERP
feedback.submitDescription: Share your thoughts, report bugs, or request new features
feedback.subject: Subject
feedback.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your feedback in detail...
feedback.myFeedbackDescription: Previously submitted feedback and their status
feedback.noFeedbackYet: You haven't submitted any feedback yet
feedback.successMessage: Your feedback has been submitted successfully. We appreciate your input!
feedback.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback?
feedback.retriggerWebhookConfirm: This will re-trigger the feedback.created webhook event for this feedback item. Are you sure?

similarItems.title: Potential Duplicates Found
similarItems.description: We found similar items in your inventory ({count} items searched)
similarItems.continueToCreate: If this is a new item, continue filling out the form below to create it.
similarItems.searchError: Unable to check for duplicates. You can still create the item.

checkInOut.exceedsCheckedOut: Cannot check in more than {count} items
checkInOut.exceedsAvailable: Cannot check out more than {count} available items

checkedOut.title: Checked Out Items
checkedOut.subtitle: Items currently checked out from your inventory
checkedOut.noItemsDescription: Items that you check out will appear here for easy tracking

locationSuggestion.title: AI Location Suggestions
locationSuggestion.description: Based on similar items and your storage patterns
locationSuggestion.selectOrManual: Select a suggested location or choose manually from the form below.
locationSuggestion.createLocationsFirst: Create some locations first to get suggestions

gridfinity.title: Storage Planner
gridfinity.subtitle: Plan your Gridfinity storage layouts
gridfinity.gridfinityDescription: Gridfinity is a modular, open-source storage system using a standard 42mm grid. Create storage units and plan where items go with drag-and-drop.
gridfinity.createUnitDescription: Define the dimensions of your storage container to calculate the grid size.
gridfinity.deleteUnitConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? All item placements will be removed.
gridfinity.createFirst: Create your first Gridfinity storage unit to start planning
gridfinity.dragToPlace: Drag items onto the grid to place them
gridfinity.autoLayoutPartialError: Placed {success} items, but {failed} failed to place

placementDialog.title: Select Bin Size
placementDialog.overlapWarning: This size would overlap with an existing bin. Choose a smaller size.

editPlacementDialog.title: Edit Bin Size
editPlacementDialog.description: Adjust the bin size for this placement
editPlacementDialog.overlapWarning: This size would overlap with another bin. Choose a smaller size.

labels.previewError: Failed to generate preview. Please try again.
labels.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups to print labels, or use Download instead.

storagePlanner.createDescription: Set up a new storage planning system to organize your inventory items with precision placement and visual planning tools.

selectType.title: Choose Your Storage System
selectType.description: Different storage systems work best for different use cases. Select the type that matches your physical storage setup.
selectType.helpText: Not sure which to choose? Gridfinity is great for drawers and toolboxes, while pegboards work well for wall-mounted tool organization.

configuration.title: Configure Your Storage
configuration.description: Set up the dimensions and details for your {type}. Measure your physical container to ensure accurate grid planning.

review.title: Review Your Configuration
review.description: Confirm your storage setup before creating. You can edit these settings later if needed.
review.comingSoonDescription: This storage type is not yet available. Please select Gridfinity to proceed.

gridfinity.title: Gridfinity
gridfinity.description: The popular open-source modular storage system. Perfect for organizing small parts, tools, and components in drawers and containers.
gridfinity.longDescription: Gridfinity uses a standardized 42mm grid system that allows you to mix and match bins of different sizes. Plan exactly where each item goes, then 3D print bins to fit.

multiboard.title: Multiboard / Pegboard / Honeycomb
multiboard.description: Wall-mounted modular storage with hooks and accessories. Ideal for frequently-used tools and supplies.
multiboard.longDescription: Plan your wall storage layout before drilling a single hole. Visualize hook placements and ensure you have room for all your tools.
multiboard.comingSoonDescription: We're working on adding support for Multiboard, Pegboard, and Honeycomb wall storage systems. Check back soon!

toteRack.title: Storage Tote Rack
toteRack.description: Organize bins and totes on shelving units. Track what's in each bin with a visual map of your storage rack.
toteRack.longDescription: Create a digital map of your shelving system. Know exactly which bin contains what, and generate labels to mark each position.
toteRack.comingSoonDescription: We're working on adding support for storage tote rack systems. Check back soon!

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.subtitle: Share your inventory with family or team members
collaboration.noCollaboratorsDescription: Invite family members or team members to help manage your inventory
collaboration.noSharedInventoriesDescription: You haven't been invited to any shared inventories yet
collaboration.viewerDescription: Can view items, categories, and locations
collaboration.editorDescription: Can create and edit items, categories, and locations
collaboration.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this shared inventory?
collaboration.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from your inventory?
collaboration.alreadyInvited: This email has already been invited
collaboration.alreadyCollaborator: This user is already a collaborator
